Cloud “This is the Temple of the Ancients. You won't be able to go back easily.”

Aeris “Whew! We finally caught up to you.”

“They've been away from their Planet for a long time to protect this Temple.”

Aeris “No good. I don't understand the rest. Are you afraid?”
“Is it because Sephiroth is in the Temple? Or something else?”
